embed.description: At Snowdwell's peak is built a shrine which honors the spirit of adventurers who never returned. A series of statues offer challenges that can be completed to unlock different charms. Unlike the rest of the buildings, all challenges are always available and can be completed in any order.

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value:
Lone Survivor - **Frog Charm** - Win a battle with just your Leader remaining
Snowball Fight - **Pengu Charm** - Stack 15 Snow on a single target
Big Hitter - **Moose Charm** - Deal 50 damage in a single hit
Bigger Hitter - **Durian Charm** - Deal 100 damage in a single hit
Tough Nut - **Peppernut Charm** - Stack 50 Shell on a single target
Ritual - **Lamb Charm** - Sacrifice 10 allies in a single battle
Toxic - **Truffle Charm** - Stack 20 Shroom on a single target
One Punch - **Molten Egg Charm** - Defeat the Frost Guardian with a Scrappy Sword

fields.name: More Unlocks
fields.value:
Icemaster - **Block Charm** - Stack 5 Block on a single target
High Roller - **Greed Charm** - Buy 3 Charms from a single shop
Gnome Friend - **Chuckle Charm** - Spare the Naked Gnome
Long Live the King - **Moko Charm** - Survive an attack from King Moko and win the battle
Feed the Beast - **Strawberry Charm** - Feed the Muncher a Consume item
Balloonist - **Raspberry Charm** - Win a Daily Voyage
Undefeated - **Critical Charm** - Achieve a 3 Win Streak
Sunbringer - **Spark Charm** - Defeat the Heart of the Storm

embed.title: Challenge Shrine
